thread.title: Fantastic luxury hotel

author: Asal L
title: Fantastic luxury hotel
text: Well when i am talking about this hotel i can not resist that how much fun i had in this hotel. my friends and i had an absolutely great time in this hotel .the staffs are really kind and helpful they guided us really well.the servise is absolutely great and i highly recommend this hotel for traveling by your friends or family.wishe you all the best
